about_the_game:
This pack contains many resources that can be used to create various maps such as town squares, factory areas, and dungeons, as well as school buildings, classrooms, and a gymnasium inspired by a "Japanese School.

- In addition to standard classrooms, models are provided for rooms such as an art room, music room, and restrooms, as well as their constituent parts, making them ideal for creating a "game set in a Japanese school". With some creative lighting, it could be useful for "horror-style games".

- A windswept factory zone, a town square lined with food stalls, a sci-fi style dungeon, a sandy beach with palm trees. Parts are also included to add impressive scenes to your games.

- The pack's models are combined to include a variety of gimmicks, and sample maps are included to help you use them in your games.

[Smile Objects Vol.2 - Contents]
-- 3D Stamps: 218
School Items: 107 (From structures such as school buildings, classrooms, stairs, and a swimming pool, to interiors such as chairs and desks, toilets and lockers, to small items such as books in the staff room and cleaning supplies in the restrooms.)
Apartments: 2 (Exterior, door)
Factory Items: 35 (From structures such as containers, tanks, steel stairs and steel frames to smaller items such as a trash can, rails and railings.)
Town Items: 74 (From houses, pathways, stalls, and various rocks, to furniture such as a bookshelf and bed, to wooden boxes and a hamberg steak lunch. Some of the objects are billboard-type objects.)

-- Terrains: 17
-- 2D Stamp: 1 (Student: walk, wait)
-- Images: 10

-- Sample Maps: 15
The following maps are connected by events and can be walked through. Various gimmicks are also set up to help you use the contents of this resource pack in your games.
- School building, classrooms (corridor, classrooms, staff room, music room, art room, gymnasium, 2 restrooms, swimming pool)
- Town, back alleys, factory area, dungeon, sandy beach

short_description: A school building, classrooms, and a gymnasium - this pack contains many models perfect for creating games set in "Japanese schools". Also included are parts for creating scenes such as factory zones and city squares. It also helps to create games of various genres, such as horror games.
